message.name: ERR_MISSING_POA_CLASS_FOR_ROLE_POA

message.locale: Power of Attorney (POA) Type must be provided if Role is 'Power of Attorney'.

message.locale: 'First Name' must be provided if the 'Role Type' is 'Individual'.

message.locale: 'Last Name' must be provided if the 'Role Type' is 'Individual'.

message.locale: 'Name' fields must be empty when Role Type is 'Organization'.

message.locale: 'Name' fields must be empty when Role Type is 'Individual' and the Person/Prospect Person exists in the system.

message.name: ERR_NAME_NOT_EMPTY_FOR_ROLE_TYPE_ORGANIZATION_WHEN_EXTERNAL_PARTY_ALREAY_EXISTS
message.locale: 'Name' fields must be empty when Role Type is 'Organization' and the External Party exists in the system.

message.locale: Mailing Address required to register Third Party Contact whose Role & Role Type combination is not 'Individual' & 'Personal'/'Power of Attorney'.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MAILING_ADDR_WHEN_REGISTER_3RD_PARTY_CONTACT_2
message.locale: Mailing Address required to register Third Party Contact whose Role & Role Type combination is not 'Individual' & 'Personal'/'Power of Attorney'.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MAILING_ADDR_WHEN_REGISTER_3RD_PARTY_CONTACT_3
message.locale: Mailing Address required to register Third Party Contact whose Role & Role Type combination is not 'Individual' & 'Personal'/'Power of Attorney'.

message.locale: 'Received from Country' and 'Mode of Receipt' must be selected only if 'Received From' is selected as 'Foreign Government'.

message.locale: Please search for a Registered Participant or enter details for the Individual to be used as the Representative Third Party Contact before clicking 'Next'.
